short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ACE Online Tools is a collection of free handy utilities to help you in your day-to-day tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We all need online tools to do a variety of day-to-day tasks on our computer or mobile devices. AceOnlineTools is a collection of online (and completely FREE!) and easy-to-use utilities to help you in countless ways. These online tools help increase your productivity at work. We continuously keep on improving these utilities in order to make them more useful and convenient for you. Let's see a few examples of online tools available to you through this Chrome extension:

UNIT CONVERTERS
Convert among various units of time, temperature, speed, area, weight, length, volume, force, digital storage, energy, power, pressure etc. For example:

* Convert bytes to gb
* Convert Fahrenheit to Celsius
* Convert Meters to Inches
* Convert Square Meters to Square Feet
* and thousands of other unit converters!

WEB TOOLS
--* XML Formatter
--* CSS Formatter
--* JSON Formatter

UTILITIES
--* Number to Words Converter (in various languages like English, Hindi, Arabic, Chinese, Japanese, Spanish, French etc.)
--* Strong Password Generator
--* Age Calculator
--* Pomodoro Timer
--* List Sorting
--* Morse Code Encode/Decode
--* Coin Flip

RANDOMIZATION TOOLS
--* Generate Random Proverbs
--* Random Phone Numbers Generator
--* Generate Random Words, Verbs, Adverbs, Adjectives, Nouns
--* Randome Image Generator
--* Word Shuffler
--* Shuffle Lines, Lists

ONLINE TYPING TOOLS
--* English to Hindi Phonetic Typing

SOCIAL MEDIA TOOLS
--* YouTube Thumbnail Downloader

MATHS TOOLS
--* LCM Calculator
--* HCF/GCD Calculator
--* Average Calculator

TEXT TOOLS
--* Bionic Reading Converter
--* Text to Handwriting Converter
--* Extract Email Addresses from Text
--* Lorem Ipsum Dummy Text Generator
--* Fancy Text Generator
--* Cool Font Generator
--* Cursive Font Generator
--* Word Counter
